original: Kiel, Tyskl., av Hermann K. o. Louise Dietsch. G. 37 m. fil lic. Gunvor Hallqvist. Barn: Ingolf f. 39. — Stud :ex. i Kiel 27, teor. teol. ex. 31, prakt. teol. ex. samt prästv. f. Schles-v^ig-Hol’Stein 32. Pastor i Rickling i Holstein 32, bitr. pastor i Christinæ Tyska förs. i Gbg 33, tf. kyrkoh. där 35 o. kyrkoh. sed. 41. Uti :sekr. i Gbgs Gustav Adolfsfören. 35. Skr.: Die frühere Deutsche Schule zu Gotlien-burg (42), Joh. Chr. Knebels u. Friedr. Krantz’ Hundertjahrchronik der Deutsch. Christm’enigem. zu Gothen-burg 1623-1723 (42) Bilder zur Gesch. der Deutsch. Christinengem. zu Go-thenburg (42), Jahrbücher der Deutsch. Christinengem. zu Gothenburg 1757-1943 (43), art. i tidn. o. tid’skr., särsk. i Julhälsningar ... i Gbgs stift.
translated: Kiel, Germany, son of Hermann K. and Louise Dietsch. Married in 1937 to Gunvor Hallqvist, a holder of a Bachelor's degree. Children: Ingolf, born in 1939. Completed studies: examination in Kiel in 1927, theoretical theological examination in 1931, practical theological examination, and ordained as a priest in Schleswig-Holstein in 1932. Served as a pastor in Rickling, Holstein in 1932, assistant pastor in Christinæ German Congregation in Gothenburg in 1933, acting vicar in Gothenburg in 1935, and vicar since 1941. Also served as secretary in Gothenburg's Gustav Adolfs Association since 1935. Writings: "The Former German School in Gothenburg" in 1942, "Joh. Chr. Knebel's and Friedr. Krantz's Centenary Chronicle of the German Christian Congregation in Gothenburg, 1623-1723" in 1942, "Images from the History of the German Christian Congregation in Gothenburg" in 1942, "Yearbooks of the German Christian Congregation in Gothenburg, 1757-1943" in 1943, articles in newspapers and magazines, particularly in "Julhälsningar ... in Gothenburg's diocese."
